intents: Open monthly weight statistics
Navigates to the statistics section to display the user\'s monthly weight data overview.
Navigate to vibration settings
Navigates to settings to disable the app\'s reminder vibration feature for user notifications.
Change weight measurement unit
Changes the app\'s weight measurement unit to pounds in the user settings.
Add a new food entry
Adds a new food item named "mushroom" to the app\'s food database for tracking nutrition.
intent_summary: The assistant helps manage weight statistics, adjust settings, change weight units, and add new food entries for tracking.

intents: Add a new recipe
Adds a new recipe titled "Fry Rice" with "Rice" as the ingredient to the app\'s recipe list.
Set regional and language preferences
Sets the app\'s region to North America and language to English for personalized seasonal recipe content.
Navigate to support page
Navigates the user to the app\'s support page via the navigation drawer.
Add a new category named Lunch
Adds a new category named "Lunch" to the app\'s category list.
intent_summary: The assistant helps users add recipes and categories, set regional language preferences, and access the appâ€™s support page.

intents: Select and view 30-day analysis data
Navigates to the analysis section and sets the data view to display statistics from the past 30 days.
Add a new medicine record
Adds a new medicine named "Claritin" to the user\'s medicine list in the app.
Change overview display event period
Navigates app settings to update the overview display events timeframe to the past 7 days.
Clear all stored event data
Clears all stored event data from the app after user confirmation.
intent_summary: The assistant helps manage medicine records, view and customize analysis data, and clear stored event information in the app.

intents: Open statistics view in app
Navigates the app to open the sleep statistics screen for viewing tracked sleep data summaries.
Initiate sleep tracking session
Starts a new sleep session by triggering the app\'s sleep tracking to begin after a short delay.
Set sleep report duration filter
Sets the sleep report duration filter to show data from the last month in the app\'s settings.
Deletes all recorded sleep entries
Deletes all recorded sleep entries after user confirmation, effectively clearing the entire sleep history.
intent_summary: The assistant helps users track sleep, view sleep statistics, filter reports, and delete all recorded sleep data.

intents: Open archive page
Navigates the app to open the Archive page by selecting the "More options" menu and then "Archive".
Add a new expense entry
Adds a new expense entry with a fixed amount of 20 to the user\'s expense list.
Switch app theme to light
Changes the app\'s display theme to the light mode through the settings menu.
Switch to a different account
Switches the user to a different account by navigating to the next account view.
intent_summary: The assistant can help manage expenses, switch accounts, change the app theme, and access the archive page.
